column4: Yes.. then when it works like it should, run a diff on the sourcecode and submit the differences in your code to theirs as a patch with documentation and the bug report it fixes
thanks , but where does all of it start ? i mean i gotta start somewhere , sometime

how do you mean.. it starts with you.. d/l the source and tinker with it.. or don't... but if you do, people (meaning everyday code stupid people like me) will love you more and exhault your name through the ages
Thats more than an incentive for me , Im guna log on to sourceforge :P
